name: Among Us Arena Classic
description:
This is a fan game and not affiliated with Innersloth LLC, and the content contained therein is not endorsed or otherwise sponsored by Innersloth LLC.

For fans of the original, slower neutral but big punish game of the original release of Among Us Arena, but with all the quality of life content of Ultimate! No special attacks, no pushblock, no burst. Just you and your opponent! You can enable newer abilites added to pre-Ultimate Among Us Arena as well, such as dashing and the beam super!

If you like this game, please consider donating to support the REAL fighting game my team and I are currently working on! 

  • Follow me on Twitter!
  • Make sure you also support the devs over at Innersloth! 
  • Check out the community discord! 
  • Try out Among Us Arena Ultimate!
  • Click Here if you'd like to download an old version!
  • Some quick notes about controls before you start playing!
    • Default keyboard controls are WASD / TYU GHJ
    • If you're trying to use a controller, we've had issues with Steam's controller support. Potential solutions include:
      • Make sure Steam is closed and not running
      • Run the game through Steam's "Non-Steam Application feature.
    • Yes, you can change your controls! It's in the settings menu!
